messageText:
1. 0x8dCed51c9D6D959A94f19E9238735F298FF3eDde
2. 4DS5QkBvHHnnuoRYop7jaHbnrpvg75w83Jhg3PMvK9KV
3. My aeMIM-CASH LP token address is AUu5gTpWr8cjQu145MbMrFfyZaE8fecS3mzZGx1gryYY
   It is owned by 4DS5QkBvHHnnuoRYop7jaHbnrpvg75w83Jhg3PMvK9KV
4. Before the hack I deposited CASH and received LP: 31dNHgnDBe3Esus4jm6bs4vF3F4ycr6BjhgrQ8rgXN3RqdNju5RhfdNDfemsSocpqqPGDo6jEQdyp4Bq3DH9D377
   I staked my LP in Quarry. After the hack I unstaked and withdraw liquidity.
   Withdraw transaction: 3mP6qbKkWcwZ1YCXN84yvUGRaoZhzpvvtV69pe5NMjqTgxvxEGvPdGBwLFDStnYYmAXB4rZ9aodWPMhXpjQSMPNU
5. I deposited 25,442.72 in CASH. This amounts to 25,245.84 aeMIM-CASH LP tokens.
6. These are half of my savings, I was planning to put them into Anchor UST soon, but was using Saber/Quarry as they had better rates in stablecoin pools.
I live in Kazakhstan and got really screwed by my bank (Bank Astana) going bankrupt in 2018, so I was moving my savings into crypto since then, as I don't trust our government or banks anymore.
I'm 34, work in IT and the funds I lost represent close to 3 years of my work. I'm getting married soon and been saving to buy a house/flat to move with my fiance and my parents.
